products.name: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds Pro
products.description: Premium wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and crystal clear sound quality.

reviews.title: Amazing sound quality!
reviews.comment: These earbuds exceeded my expectations. The noise cancellation is incredible and the battery life is exactly as advertised.

reviews.title: Good value for money
reviews.comment: Great earbuds for the price. Sound quality is good and they're comfortable for long listening sessions.

products.name: Smart Fitness Watch Series 8
products.description: Advanced fitness tracking watch with heart rate monitoring, GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life.

reviews.title: Perfect for fitness tracking
reviews.comment: Love this watch! The heart rate monitoring is accurate and the battery life is amazing.

products.name: Premium Leather Handbag
products.description: Handcrafted genuine leather handbag with multiple compartments, perfect for work and travel.

reviews.title: Beautiful and well-made
reviews.comment: The leather quality is excellent and the craftsmanship is outstanding. Very satisfied with this purchase.

products.name: Professional Camera Lens 85mm f/1.4
products.description: Professional portrait lens with ultra-wide aperture for stunning bokeh and sharp image quality.

reviews.title: Incredible lens for portraits
reviews.comment: This lens produces absolutely stunning portraits with beautiful bokeh. Worth every penny for professional work.

products.name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt Collection
products.description: Premium organic cotton t-shirts in various colors, sustainably made and incredibly soft.

reviews.title: Love the quality and fit
reviews.comment: These shirts are incredibly soft and comfortable. Great quality and I love supporting sustainable fashion.

products.name: Smart Home Security Camera
products.description: 4K wireless security camera with night vision, motion detection, and cloud storage capabilities.

reviews.title: Good security camera
reviews.comment: Easy to set up and the video quality is excellent. The night vision works well too.

products.name: Ultra-Thin 15.6" 4K Laptop
products.description: Aluminum body, Intel i7, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, backlit keyboard, fingerprint unlock.

products.name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner Pro
products.description: Powerful suction, 60-min runtime, HEPA filter, multi-surface brush.

products.name: Men's Running Shoes AirFlex
products.description: Breathable mesh, air cushioning, durable outsole for daily runs.

products.name: Stainless Steel Cookware Set (10pcs)
products.description: Induction-ready pots and pans with tempered glass lids.

products.name: Gaming Headset 7.1 Surround
products.description: RGB lighting, noise-cancel mic, comfy memory foam earcups.

products.name: Portable Projector 1080p Mini
products.description: Compact home cinema projector with Wi-Fi and HDMI.

products.name: Skincare Set Vitamin C + HA
products.description: Brightening serum and hydrating moisturizer duo.

products.name: Camping Tent 4-Person Waterproof
products.description: Easy setup, double-layer, UV protection—ideal for weekend trips.

products.name: Office Chair Ergonomic Mesh
products.description: Adjustable lumbar support, headrest, and 3D armrests.
